data.title: Solar Turbines Inc
data.meta_description: Solar Turbines Inc manufactures the world’s most widely used family of mid-sized industrial gas turbines. Solar is a sponsor of ERTC Virtual 2020. Find out moreSolar Turbines is sponsoring the World Refining Association's events.
data.meta_site_name: World Refining Association | The World Refining Association provides networking opportunities & content sharing through conferences, exhibitions, networking evenings and our content portal.
data.text:
Refinery Fuel Gas, PDH off-gas, FCCU dry gas are all H2-rich gases that can now be used in Solar Turbine's gas turbine to produce mechanical power, electrical power and heat, Those solutions meet of course IED emissions directive, they enable to minimize flare operations and to decrease scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions.

Solar Turbines Incorporated, headquartered in San Diego, California, is a wholly owned subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc. Solar manufactures the world’s most widely used family of mid-sized industrial gas turbines, ranging from 1 to 23 megawatts. Solar is a leading provider of energy solutions, featuring an extensive line of gas turbine-powered compressor sets, mechanical drive packages, and generator sets.

Visit the Solar Turbine website for more information: www.solarturbines.com
